backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing car price prediction logic, validation, user history storage, and authorization via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text file summarizing major frontend components, hooks, styles, and documentation files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry file with SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata for the car price prediction site.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment guide covering prerequisites, testing checklists, SEO checks, and deployment steps.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing indexing, specifying sitemap location, and setting crawl delay.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap containing the canonical homepage entry with metadata for search engines.
frontend/README.md: Developer documentation describing project structure, entry points, and local workflow for the car price prediction system.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup, prediction flow, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section with project overview, founder info, and dynamic contact details.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the footer with branding, social links, contact info, and founder details using API data when available.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, authentication handling, and scroll-based UI updates.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Provides the homepage hero section with animated visuals, main CTA buttons, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx: Renders a login form using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PredictionForm.t: Provides a detailed form for entering car specifications, validating inputs, and submitting prediction requests.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form component for creating a user profile with validation and async save using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Injects JSON-LD structured data for SEO into the document head on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for user profiles, contact info, car price predictions, and prediction history using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS defining color palettes, dark mode variables, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theming (colors, radius, shadows), custom animations, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including schema versions, features, image requirements, and pending requests for full frontend and backend code.
